person.persName: Edward Riley (Cincinnati, OH, farmer, pvt 1st Ky L.A.)

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, farmer and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Julie A. Riley. Resident of Cincinnati, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in 1864. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as a private from September 10, 1863, to July 26, 1865.
